title: Veiled Syndicate
summary: A covert faction thriving in the shadows of frontier stations, trading in secrets and forbidden tech.

callbacks.response: Highlight how the Veiled Syndicate's informants shift their focus to the revelation, tightening their surveillance.

title: Shadowport Expanse
summary: A hidden dockyard carved into an asteroid's heart, pulsing with neon markets and quiet backroom deals.

callbacks.response: Describe the glow of illegal markets and the Syndicate operatives watching from the catwalks.

title: Black Cipher
summary: An obsidian data-shard rumored to contain jump coordinates to Precursor vaults guarded by the Syndicate.

callbacks.response: Let the narrative tease encoded whispers from the shard, hinting at deeper Syndicate entanglements.
